message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to detect political bias in long text content. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses universal sentence encoders and other existing methods, which fall under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Learning). The paper also deals with information retrieval and classification, which fall under the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper proposes a two-step classification scheme, which can be considered as a system or application, and therefore falls under the sub-category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
